game.withersweeper.desc: Uncover all fields not containing mines without being detonated! Use number fields as clues to find mines!
game.withersweeper.desc.controls.flag: %s - mark a field as containing a mine
text.withersweeper.complete: The board has been completed in %s seconds!
text.withersweeper.info.number: This field has %s mine around it
text.withersweeper.info.number.plural: This field has %s mines around it
text.withersweeper.reveal_mine.max_mista: %s revealed a mine! The maximum of %s mistakes have been made.
